mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rno,cid,pfile,ptitle,pprice,pstate from(select c.cid,f.pfile,p.ptitle,p.pprice,p.pstate from DAANGN_PRODUCT p ,DAANGN_CART c,DAANGN_FILE f where p.pid=c.pid and c.pid=f.pid and c.id=#{id} order by cdate desc))where rno between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) from daangn_cart where id=#{id}
select count(cid) from daangn_cart where pid=#{pid} and id=#{uid}
mapper.delete: delete from daangn_cart where pid=#{pid} and id=#{uid}
mapper.update: update daangn_member set mfile=#{mfile},omfile=#{omfile} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from daangn_member where id=#{id} and pass=#{pass}
select id, name, email, phone, gender, birth, nick, address from daangn_member where id = #{id}
mapper.update: update daangn_member set pass=#{pass}, name=#{name}, email=#{email}, phone=#{phone}, address=#{address}, gender=#{gender}, birth=#{birth} ,nick=#{nick} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT test.pid,test.pfile,test.ptitle,test.pprice,to_char(test.bdate,'yyyy-mm-dd')bdate FROM ( SELECT odr.pid, files.pfile, pdt.ptitle, pdt.PPRICE,odr.bdate , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY files.pid ORDER BY sysdate DESC) ITEM_RN FROM daangn_file files, (select pid,bdate from daangn_order where id=#{id}) odr, daangn_product pdt where odr.pid = pdt.pid and pdt.pid = files.pid(+) ) TEST WHERE ITEM_RN = 1

SELECT test.pid,test.pfile,test.ptitle,test.pprice,to_char(test.bdate,'yyyy-mm-dd')bdate FROM ( SELECT odr.pid, files.pfile, pdt.ptitle, pdt.PPRICE,odr.bdate , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY files.pid ORDER BY sysdate DESC) ITEM_RN FROM daangn_file files, (select pid,bdate from daangn_order_review where id=#{id}) odr, daangn_product pdt where odr.pid = pdt.pid and pdt.pid = files.pid(+) ) TEST WHERE ITEM_RN = 1

select test.ptitle, test.id, test.pfile from( select pdt.ptitle, pdt.id, files.PFILE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY files.pid ORDER BY sysdate desc) ITEM_RN from DAANGN_PRODUCT pdt, daangn_file files, (select *from daangn_product where pid = #{pid}) odr where odr.pid = pdt.pid and pdt.pid = files.pid(+))test where ITEM_RN =1
